auth.appleAuthCanceledError: The user canceled the authorization attempt.
auth.appleAuthInvalidResponseError: The authorization request received an invalid response.
auth.appleAuthUnknownError: The authorization attempt failed for an unknown reason.
auth.invalidCredentialsErrorMessage: Wrong username / email or password. Please try again.
auth.invalidEmailFormatErrorMessage: Make sure your email format is "name@domain.com".
auth.invalidPasswordFormatErrorMessage: Password has to be at least 6 characters long.
auth.invalidUsernameFormatErrorMessage: Username has to have at least 3 characters, start with a letter and contain only lowercase letters, numbers and underscores.
auth.manualApprovalMessage: Your registration request is being reviewed. Thank you for your patience.
auth.profileUpdatingErrorMessage: There was an error while updating your profile. Please try again.
auth.socialLoginSectionTitle: or sign in/sign up with your other account
auth.unknownEmailErrorMessage: Your username / email was not found.
auth.usernameTakenErrorMessage: That email or username is taken. Please choose another one or try to sign in.
